item.description:
Looking for something new and fun to do? Join us for a class like no other. Paint and Pour offers a unique experience. Art as Entertainment! No experience necessary! Their instructor will guide us through the process STEP-BY-STEP. You CAN do it and you WILL love it!

The class will last approximately 2-3 hours.  Don't forget that Paint and Pour is a BYOB establishment (Alcohol is limited to wine and beer and must be 21 to bring alcohol).  They will have soft drinks and snacks on hand for purchase. Finally, put your artist hat on, follow along with the instructor, paint and have fun!! They supply the materials, aprons, and instruction and will even clean up! You get to take home your masterpiece after the class! Our class is on the second day of spring, so I chose this image of cherry blossoms for us to paint.

If you'd like, we will be having dinner before the class at 5:30 next door at the Halfway Cafe, 51 Main St, Maynard. Please update your rsvp to let me know if you plan on joining us for dinner, too.

http://paintnpourma.com/
item.name: Paint and Pour!
